PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-09482000-06-200,  ,  ,  ,  PWGS
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of CEDRIC E. RITCHIE, of Toronto, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Robert Murray McClelland, whose term has expired.
Attachments
